item.title: Aspose.Words for Java 4.0.2 BETA Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Words for Java 4.0.2 BETA A comment in a Word document can be anchored to a position or to a range of text. Earlier versions of Aspose.Words supported comments anchoring to a position of text only. If a comment was anchored to a range of text (and that is the most common scenario), Aspose.Words lost the range information and converted the comment as anchored to the end position of the commented text.

item.title: Aspose.Words for Java 4.0.1 BETA Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Words for Java 4.0.1 BETA The term “BETA” applies only to the “Save to PDF” functionality in this version. The following issues were addressed:
